TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Reuven_Rivlin, title = Reuven_Rivlin, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Reuven_Rivlin} }

S.FORM: I 1939 a miheca saka 9 folad saka 9 a romi'ad masofoc ci Reuven Rivlin, malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Israel anini i ci Reuven Rivlin, patirengan a romi'ad i 2014 a miheca saka 7 folad saka 24 a romi'ad.

I 1939 a miheca saka 9 folad saka 9 a romi'ad masofoc ci Reoven Rivlin, malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Israel anini i ci Reoven Rivlin, patirengan a romi'ad i 2014 a miheca saka 7 folad saka 24 a romi'ad.
